website_summaries.verdict: AT&T's iPhone 5 takes a speedy, elegant, yet familiar phone and puts it on a LTE network that's super fast?if you can get it.
cons: New Maps app needs a lot of work
AT&T LTE coverage not quite up to Verizon's levels

customer_reviews.title: This phone worked fine until three months after we bought it
customer_reviews.text: This phone worked fine until three months after we bought it. We took it to ATT to find out what the problem was. It was reported STOLEN. So, ATT has shut it off, Laptopaide and Amazon won't do anything for us since it's past the 30 day report a problem and 45 day return policies. We are stuck with a phone we can't re-sell or use, and we're out $156.80. BUYER BEWARE WITH THIS COMPANY. YOU JUST MIGHT BE BUYING STOLEN PROPERTY.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I got it from a fella who kept it in an otterbox and it was just like a new phone i was super satisfied. at first the battery was draining fast and getting warm. I couldnt figure out why but then i called att and they noticed that the phone was having a problem with the sim card. the sim card was for the iphone 4 i had before this. once we switched out the sim card it was working properly. these phones are easy to repair and repair is noble. i still have my old iphone 4, and the only reason i upgraded was for because the iphone4 only had 3G.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Urice

customer_reviews.title: Phone Cannot Be Connected, Need Information from Prev owner!
customer_reviews.text: Cannot get phone connected, they keep asking me for the previous owners information and some numbers that previous owner must know or have, so I basically purchased a paper weight since December of 2013 and paid over $400 for it. I would never purchase anything on Amazon that cost this much, as we all know "Money doesn't grow on trees" I work hard for my money and It sucks when you get screwed like this. Very Unhappy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: I have had my iPhone for about a year now. I bought it used off amazon. There has already been so many comparisons and such. So I will just tell about my personal experience. I like the crispness of the screen. Plus takes really great photos. The phone runs and operates very smoothly. When making calls sounds decent. The loud speaker is very mediocre in my opinion. Plus the durability of the iphone had been a major issue to. I keep my phone in a screen guard and case, so as big deal for me. Overall I have been satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: thejmjohnson

customer_reviews.title: Shoulda stuck with the store's phones
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these, one for me and one for my mom. I love the iPhone, but everything is defaulted to an Asian language, and my mom's phone crashed within 6 months. She took it in to her service store, and they couldn't even fix it.
customer_reviews.author: plainmaryjane

customer_reviews.title: Crap phone
customer_reviews.text: Goes from 100% battery to 50% within 15-20 min of use, I constantly have to have it on the charger. The rear camera takes unfocused photos because the camera seems fogged over.
customer_reviews.author: StreetsWife

customer_reviews.title: Love my phone....now
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone about 3 months ago, it was very strange the first month i had the phone it had a lot of problems, it would act up all the time and freeze. It really frustrated me because i payed so much and i work so hard for my money. But its all good now, it totally self corrected and now i love it!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: extremely pleased with the product quality and price
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint was that it did not come with a manual (we are new to iphones, but we have YouTube 😉) and I thought the description said ear buds were included, but didn't get any of those either. Overall, the phone looked brand new, extremely pleased with the product quality and price! I have a happy 12 year old!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rstanfill

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE SELLER! NOT RELIABLE! DON'T BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: One star because of the seller, not the product. I bought more than a year ago, the cellphone is still working greatly, but I can't unlock it now. The ATT wrote me: "Your device seems to be active on an AT&T customer’s account. I tried to contact the seller but they didn't reply. Really disappointed and frustrated.

customer_reviews.title: defective

Another annoying thing is i have extra Iphone charges that work on all Iphones and Ipods but the 5 of course! But otherwise great phone

customer_reviews.text: When I first received the phone I thought it was great, 2 weeks in the charge began not holding and I couldn't use it outside when it was below 85 degrees. I'd have to warm it up to get it to turn on again. And then it would tell me it was at 10% charge, I'd plug it in and immediately it would tell me it was at 78 or 80%. I now have to buy a new phone!!!

customer_reviews.title: Lesson Learned
customer_reviews.text: I paid for a brand new phone but what I got was a phone that was a year old. I took it to the Apple Store and they took the serial number on the phone and told me that it was purchased over a year ago and had been used since. That being said, the phone did come in a condition that was passable (small crack near camera and home button was stuck a bit). But I wanted a brand new phone and I got a used one even though the seller claimed it was new. You get what you pay for, but from now on I'll be buying my phones through a trusted retailer.

product_meta.title: Apple iPhone 5 16GB Black (MD634LL/A) GSM 4G LTE - AT&T Wireless
product_meta.description: With the iPhone 5, Apple equips this smartphone with a larger 4-inch retina display, adds 4G LTE high-speed data, and includes a faster A6 processor. The iPhone 5 also features global roaming, Siri voice assistant, AirPlay media streaming, an 8-megapixel camera with HD recording, and a HD front facing camera. This model comes with 16 GB of internal storage and supports WiFi connectivity, so you can browse the Web, stream videos, shop online, and chat with friends from wherever you are. The iPhone 5 offers a slim and stylish design that is both lightweight and easy to carry.
feature_bullets: With the iPhone 5, Apple equips this smartphone with a larger 4-inch retina display, adds 4G LTE high-speed data, and includes a faster A6 processor
The iPhone 5 also features global roaming, Siri voice assistant, AirPlay media streaming, an 8-megapixel camera with HD recording, and a HD front facing camera
This model comes with 16 GB of internal storage and supports WiFi connectivity, so you can browse the Web, stream videos, shop online, and chat with friends from wherever you are
The iPhone 5 offers a slim and stylish design that is both lightweight and easy to carry.
This product has been extensively tested, is certified to be 100% functional, and ready for activation

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars387 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Wireless communication technologies: Wi-Fi, GSM / EDGE / CDMA / LTE / GPS and GLONASS, Bluetooth 4.0
